title: Pot Businesses In Colorado Promote 'Green Friday'
teaser: In Colorado, pot businesses are offering Black Friday deals — except they're calling the day "Green Friday."
contentencoded:
On this Black Friday, many Americans are shopping for flat screen TVs, toys and jewelry. But in Colorado, pot businesses are also trying to hawk their product.

Bloomberg News reports on pot businesses offering Black Friday deals — except they’re calling the day “Green Friday.” Bloomberg’s Michael Regan joins Here & Now’s Robin Young with details.

  • Read more via Bloomberg News

Guest
